```{r}
library(pwr)
library(Superpower)
```

#To test wheteher there is a statistically significant difference between the mean reaction times of congruent and incongruent trials in different contingency conditions, we are going to use a paired samples t-test.
```{r}
pwr.t.test(d = 0.2, power = 0.80, sig.level = 0.05, type = "paired", alternative = "two.sided")
```
